odometry

Class Odometer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • odometry.AbstractOdometer
        • odometry.Odometer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Odometer
extends AbstractOdometer
    A simple implementation of an odometer that records motor rotations and computes angle of rotation values.
    Author:
    Michael Golfi #260552298, Paul Albert-Lebrun #260507074
